MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA5 postcode area of Mauchline, affecting properties in Mary Morrison Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.17pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:59 PM on Sunday, 11 October 2020.
